definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: If you aren't called to go, then choose to be a sender.
sentences.chinese: 若你没有被呼召出去，选择作为一个差派者。

sentences.english: He sent His sinless Son to bear the full brunt of the penalty we deserved to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 他差派他无罪的儿子承担我们应该遭受的全部刑罚。

sentences.english: When David heard of it, he sent Joab and all the army of the mighty men.
sentences.chinese: 大卫听见了，就差派约押统带勇猛的全军出去。

sentences.english: He called the disciples together and then sent them to preach to the people.
sentences.chinese: 他把门徒召集到一起，然后差派他们去传道。

sentences.english: Yet Isaiah undertook the task God gave him.
sentences.chinese: 但以赛亚却接受了神所差派的工作。

sentences.english: To save us, God sent Jesus down to earth to become a man.
sentences.chinese: 神为了拯救我们，差派耶稣道成肉身，降世为人。

sentences.english: Why Jesus gave His disciples those instructions when He sent them out to evangelize?
sentences.chinese: 耶稣差派门徒出去布道时为何对他们有这些吩咐？

sentences.english: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.
sentences.chinese: 大卫听见了，就差派约押统带勇猛的全军出去。

sentences.english: Lord Jesus let your Holy Spirit work in me today.
sentences.chinese: 主耶稣，求你差派圣灵在我心里工作。

sentences.english: Some churches send out workers to visit monthly.
sentences.chinese: 因此一些教会差派同工每月去探访他们。

sentences.english: The main objective of the Purva ("earlier") Mimamsa school was to establish the authority of the Vedas.
sentences.chinese: 弥曼差派的早期主要目标是建立吠陀的权威。

sentences.english: And when David heard of it， he sent Joab， and all the host of the mighty men.
sentences.chinese: 大卫听见了，就差派约押统带勇猛的全军出去。

sentences.english: From time to time God would send an angel to stir the waters of the pool.
sentences.chinese: 上帝偶尔会差派天使搅动池子里的水。

sentences.english: Later God sent Nahum to cry against it again.
sentences.chinese: 神后来再差派那鸿去斥责他们。

sentences.english: You may be God's messenger to that person.
sentences.chinese: 你或许就是神所差派给那个人的使者。

sentences.english: Was one of the 12 spies sent into the promised land by Moses.
sentences.chinese: 是摩西差派进入应许之地的12个探子之一。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
